title: School Rebuild – Kisumu County
summary: A community audit revealed 80% of the school project was completed.
description: Photos were submitted by locals showing construction progress.
The audit confirmed appropriate use of materials and timelines.
Remaining 20% flagged for follow-up by the county education office.
quotes: “This school was once abandoned. Today, my daughter studies here.” – Amina, parent
“Wajibu’s audit helped us push the local leaders into action.” – Eric, civic volunteer
